tags.name: ef-color-dialog
tags.description:
Displays a colour picker dialog,
for selecting a predefined range of colours.

attributes.name: allow-nocolor
attributes.description: Set the palettes to activate no-color option

attributes.name: value
attributes.description:
Value of selected color from color dialog will be written here as hex value
e.g. "#00f" or "#0000ff"

attributes.name: hex
attributes.description: Value of hex without # sign, supports both 3-digits shorthand hex and regular 6-digits hex

attributes.name: header
attributes.description: Set Header/Title of the color dialog

attributes.name: x
attributes.description: Set a specific x coordinate of dialog

attributes.name: y
attributes.description: Set a specific y coordinate of dialog

attributes.name: no-cancel-on-esc-key
attributes.description: Prevents dialog to close when user presses ESC key

attributes.name: position-target
attributes.description: Set position of dialog i.e. `top`, `right`, `left`, `bottom`, `center` or combination of theme e.g. `top right`.

properties.name: allowNocolor
properties.description: Set the palettes to activate no-color option

properties.name: value
properties.description:
Value of selected color from color dialog will be written here as hex value
e.g. "#00f" or "#0000ff"

properties.name: hex
properties.description: Value of hex without # sign, supports both 3-digits shorthand hex and regular 6-digits hex

properties.name: header
properties.description: Set Header/Title of the color dialog

properties.name: noCancelOnEscKey
properties.description: Prevents dialog to close when user presses ESC key

properties.name: x
properties.description: Set a specific x coordinate of dialog

properties.name: y
properties.description: Set a specific y coordinate of dialog

properties.name: positionTarget
properties.description: Set position of dialog i.e. `top`, `right`, `left`, `bottom`, `center` or combination of theme e.g. `top right`.

properties.name: noCancelOnOutsideClick
properties.description: Prevents dialog to close when user clicks outside the dialog.

properties.name: draggable
properties.description: False to make the dialog not draggable.

properties.name: withShadow
properties.description: False to remove shadow for dialog component.
